Metaheuristic

Distributer framework for hyper-parameter optimization and AutoML.

View project on GitHub
  • Index

Table of contents

  • Definition
  • Structure

Definition

When snippet is being invoked it will be supplied with an absolute path to parameter file. This parameter will always be the last parameter in the list of parameters which snippet will receive.

Structure

This parameter file has the follow structure:

disk:
- code: input-dir
  path: /dataset/input-dir
envs:
  python-3: python3
  java-11: java -jar
mirrors:
  https://github.com/sergmain/metaheuristic.git: /git-mirror/mh/metaheuristic.git

Top-level fields in env.yaml:

  • disk - The current version of format of params.yaml file.
  • envs - defines pair of key-value for code of env (key) and executable (value)
  • mirrors - defines pair of key-value for real url of git's repository (key) and local dir which represents the mirror of remote git's repository. So in this string: 
    https://github.com/sergmain/metaheuristic.git: /git-mirror/mh/metaheuristic.git

    https://github.com/sergmain/metaheuristic.git - remote git’s url /git-mirror/mh/metaheuristic.git - local directory of git’s repository

metaheuristic is maintained by sergmain.
